verses.verse: In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6645>Zibiah<s%> of <S%H884>Beer<s%>â€“sheba.

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all his <S%H3117>days<s%> where <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> instructed <S%H3384>him<s%>.
But the high <S%H1116>places<s%> were not taken <S%H5493>away<s%>: the <S%H5971>people<s%> still <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, All the <S%H3701>money<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%> that is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even the <S%H3701>money<s%> of every <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H5674>passes<s%> the <S%H3701>account<s%>, the money that every <S%H5315>man<s%> is set <S%H6187>at<s%>, and all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that <S%H5927>comes<s%> into any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

Let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it to <S%H376>them<s%>, every man of his <S%H4378>acquaintance<s%>: and let them <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, wheresoever any <S%H919>breach<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%>.

But it was <S%H7969>so<s%>, that in the three and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had not <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the other <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2388>them<s%>, Why repair you not the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>? now therefore <S%H3947>receive<s%> no more <S%H3701>money<s%> of your <S%H4378>acquaintance<s%>, but <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it for the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H225>consented<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> more <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1115>neither<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H727>chest<s%>, and <S%H5344>bored<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H1817>lid<s%> of <S%H5414>it<s%>, and set it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> as <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>door<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in it all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And it was <S%H7200>so<s%>, when they saw that there was <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H727>chest<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and they put up in <S%H6696>bags<s%>, and <S%H4487>told<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%>, being <S%H8505>told<s%>, into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of them that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, that had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and they laid it <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and <S%H1129>builders<s%>, that <S%H6213>done<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

And to <S%H1443>masons<s%>, and <S%H2672>hewers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, and to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewed<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and for all that was laid <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> to repair <S%H2394>it<s%>.

But there were not <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5592>bowls<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H4212>snuffers<s%>, <S%H4219>basins<s%>, <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>, any <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, or <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:
But they <S%H5414>gave<s%> that to the <S%H4399>workmen<s%>, and <S%H2388>repaired<s%> with it the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Moreover they <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> not with the <S%H582>men<s%>, into whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to be <S%H5414>bestowed<s%> on <S%H4399>workmen<s%>: for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%>.
The <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> was not <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: it was the <S%H3548>priests<s%>'.

Then <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H2371>it<s%>: and Hazael <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all the hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, and <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%>, and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>, his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%>, and his own hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%>, and all the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> it to <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>: and he went <S%H5927>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7194>made<s%> a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%>, and <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3101>Joash<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo<s%>, which goes <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5538>Silla<s%>.

For <S%H3108>Jozachar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8100>Shimeath<s%>, and <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7763>Shomer<s%>, his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, and he died; and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: and <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place<s%>.
